meanings: (눈에 들어오다) be seen, come in sight, (나타나다) appear
(보여 주다) show (sth to sb / sb sth), display, demonstrate, let sb see, (formal) exhibit

vlive.korean: 보이는데? They can see me. 듣기 View video TWICE : [AutoCut_JEONGYEON] TWICE July Highlight
피곤해 보이는데 집에 안 갈래? You look tired, do you want to go home? 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: You look tired, do you want to go home?

vlive.korean: 너무 멀어서 뭐라는지 안 보이는데? It's so far away I don't know what it says? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스 안녕! 보고싶다 ❤️
vlive.english: It's so far away I don't know what it says?

vlive.korean: 근데 약간 얼굴이 좋아 보이는데 순조롭게 진행 중인 건가? You look relaxed. Is it going well? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 20. 경희대 래빈VS 서울대 츄플 리매치!? 과연 살아남을 학교는 어디?
vlive.english: You look relaxed. Is it going well?

vlive.korean: 안 보여? 내 얼굴 잘 보이는데? 이렇게 딱 얼굴만 탁탁! Can you not see? I can see my face well! Just my face like this! 듣기 View video GOT7 : 쉼표방
vlive.english: Can you not see? I can see my face well! Just my face like this!

examples.korean: The law is often tardy in reacting to changing attitudes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 법률은 흔히 변화하는 태도에 반응을 보이는 데 더디다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The law is often tardy in reacting to changing attitudes. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: You look rough—are you OK? Add to Wordbook
